title.narrative: Radio Discussion on Domestication of the Violence Against Persons Prohibition Act (VAPP)

description.narrative: The aim of the activity was to sensitize the public on the need to promote the domestication of the Violence Against Persons Prohibition Act (VAPP) and take action against gender-based violence by highlighting its impact on the home and society. The programme was always aired live at Today’s 95.1 FM in Rivers State and in Creek FM 106.5 in Bayelsa State.
